did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. School of Hotel Administration. Properties Management Department

did.physdesc: Research, course material, specification files, architectural plans.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Curriculum review reports, consulting files, specifications and estimates for the Statler Hall, research studies, Statler design studios files, and course materials for Properties Management courses at Cornell, including 20 architectural drawings of the Statler Hotel.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Curriculum review reports, consulting files, specifications and estimates for the Statler Hall, research studies, Statler design studios files, and course materials for Properties Management courses at Cornell, including 20 architectural drawings of the Statler Hotel.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Properties Management Department Records, #28-2-2405. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
